# Sylvan Lake AUTOPRO
> Trusted auto repair shop serving West-Central Alberta since 2006. NAPA AUTOPRO member with 24-month/40,000km nationwide warranty.

## Business Info
- Location: 1A Industrial Dr, Sylvan Lake, AB T4S 1P4
- Phone: (403) 887-0440
- Email: service@sylvanlakeautopro.com
- Hours: Monday-Friday 8am-5pm

## Main Pages
- [Home](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/): Overview of services, trust signals, booking
- [About Us](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/about): Company history, ownership since 2006, Red Seal certified technicians, NAPA AUTOPRO membership
- [Contact](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/contact): Location, hours, map, service areas
- [Making It Easy](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/making-it-easy): Shuttle service, loaner vehicles, digital inspections, flexible payment
- [Warranty](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/warranty): NAPA Peace of Mind warranty details, 24mo/40K nationwide coverage, labor warranty

## Maintenance Services
- [Oil Change](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/oil-change): Full synthetic oil service with Castrol GTX Magnatec and NAPA Gold filters
- [Fluid Maintenance](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/fluid-maintenance): Transmission, coolant, brake fluid, power steering service with BG Products
- [Driveline Service](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/driveline): Differential, transfer case, AWD, CVT fluid service

## Brake Services
- [Brake Inspection](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/brake-inspection): Complete brake system inspection - $92.40
- [Brake Repair](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/brake-repair): Pads, rotors, calipers, brake fluid service

## Steering, Suspension & Alignment
- [Steering & Suspension](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/steering-suspension): Ball joints, tie rods, control arms, shocks, struts, wheel bearings
- [Wheel Alignment](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/alignment): Hunter HawkEye Elite precision alignment

## Diagnostics & Electrical
- [Check Engine Light](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/diagnostics): Diagnostic services, code reading, problem identification
- [Electrical Repair](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/electrical): Batteries, starters, alternators, wiring diagnosis

## Climate Control
- [A/C Service & Repair](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/ac-service-repair): Air conditioning diagnosis, repair, R-134a and R-1234yf recharge
- [Heater Repair](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/heater-repair): Heating system diagnosis and repair

## Tires & Keys
- [Tires](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/tires): Tire sales, installation, balancing, rotation, TPMS service
- [Automotive Keys](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/automotive-keys): Key cutting and transponder programming

## Specialty Services
- [Transmission Repair](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/transmission-repair): Transmission repair and custom rebuilds, 49 years builder experience
- [Engine Repair](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/engine-repair): Engine repair, head gasket replacement, rebuilt and used engine installation
- [Hybrid & EV Service](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/hybrid-ev-service): Hybrid and electric vehicle maintenance and repair
- [Fleet Services](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/fleet-services): Commercial fleet maintenance, fleet cards accepted

## Inspection Services
- [Out of Province Inspection](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/out-of-province-inspection): Alberta OOP vehicle inspections - $179.95
- [CVIP Inspection](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/cvip-inspection): Commercial vehicle safety inspections
- [Insurance Inspection](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/insurance-inspection): Insurance inspections for vehicles 12+ years - $95.99
- [Pre-Purchase Inspection](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/services/pre-purchase-inspection): Used vehicle buyer inspections - from $160

## Legal
- [Terms of Service](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/terms): Service terms, AMVIC compliance, NAPA warranty info
- [Privacy Policy](https://sylvanlakeautopro.com/privacy): Website privacy practices

## Service Area
Sylvan Lake, Red Deer, Rocky Mountain House, Rimbey, Ponoka, Blackfalds, Penhold, Eckville, Bentley, Benalto, Condor, Leslieville, Alhambra, Withrow, Evarts, Dickson, Markerville, Caroline, Bluffton, Hoadley, Jarvis Bay, Norglenwold, Gull Lake, Birchcliff

## Key Differentiators
- 4.9 Google rating (290+ reviews)
- NAPA Peace of Mind Warranty: 24 months / 40,000 km nationwide
- Digital inspections with photos and measurements
- JD Power award winner (multiple years)
- Licensed technicians
- Loaner vehicles and shuttle service available
- Serving Sylvan Lake since 2006
